text: I walked in on a Saturday afternoon without an appointment. I wanted a normal wash and blow to help ease my headache. The hair salon was busy with customers. Lucky for me, Leon was available! He was friendly, patient, empathetic and even made sure I wasn't feeling too cold from the air conditioning. The head massage and hair wash were amazing. I felt that I was very well taken care of and I would like to return for other services in the future :)

Just got my hair colored here and I'm super pleased with how it turned out! The stylist totally nailed the color I wanted, and the service was super chill. The vibe in the salon was really welcoming, and everyone there was friendly and cool. The boss was super funny too. The place was clean and had a good vibe too. Already recommended this place to my friends! Five stars, no doubt!

A small & humble business owner and team with reasonable pricing compared to other reputable hair salons. Absolutely love their hair wash and hair cut (long length). Whatâ€™s best is no hard selling at all. Will definitely recommend to do your hair services at this local humble business.

I just had my highlights done at this salon, and let me tell you, I'm over the moon with how they turned out! The staff there were super friendly and really listened to what I wanted. The highlights look amazing, exactly what I was hoping for. I had such a great time there, and I'm already planning my next visit. If you're thinking about getting highlights, definitely give this place a try!

Walked in for a wash cut and blow. I have very thick and wavy hair which takes extra time and steps during the drying part but the male staff was very patient nonetheless. He also offered to perm my hair for the final look. Much appreciation for this and will definitely return!
